name: Explodynium
description:
Solve riddles to identify misplaced chemicals in your lab. But be careful, if you make a mistake, the lab might explode!

Assets Used:

Unity Technologies Unity Particle Pack 5.x: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/asset-packs/unity-particle-pack-5-x-73777

Cookiepopworks.com Clipboard: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/clipboard-137662

Storm Bringer Studios Free Laboratory Pack: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/tools/free-laboratory-pack-123782

Music: www.bensound.com Funky Element
